channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - August 28, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-august-28-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars_ * _ALIEN_ * _Annalise_ * _Better the Devil Who Serves You_ * _Bounty of the Week_ * _Checkpoint Midnight_ * _Free from the Yoke_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Keepers of the Cards_ * _Leverage_ * _Trophy Gold_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_ * _Veil'd Fantasy_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - August 28, 2020

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:
